summary: This bill, H.R. 4787, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and modify the deduction for film and television productions. It extends the deduction's expiration date from December 31, 2025, to December 31, 2030, and increases the dollar limitation for the deduction, establishing a higher limit for productions in certain areas. It also introduces an inflation adjustment for the deduction limits, starting in 2026. The amendments apply to productions commencing after the bill's enactment.
